summary.p: Adjusts the temperature and/or tint of an image.

p.i: This effect is new in the Universal Windows Platform. It is not supported on Windows 8.1 or Phone 8.1.
Supported by Win2D but not Windows.UI.Composition.

remarks.p: This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Temperature and tint effect.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.TemperatureAndTintEffect.Temperature
member.summary: Specifies how much to increase or decrease the temperature of the image. Default value 0, range -1 to 1.
member.remarks: Temperature refers to the balance between blue and yellow colors. Increasing the temperature increases the intensity of red and green pixels, while decreasing the amount of blue. This moves colors toward yellow.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.TemperatureAndTintEffect.Tint
member.summary: Specifies how much to increase or decrease the tint of the image. Default value 0, range -1 to 1.
member.remarks: Tint refers to the balance between green and magenta colors. Increasing the tint increases the intensity of red and blue pixels, while decreasing the amount of green. This moves colors toward magenta.
